content.description:
Descent:

On 2/27/21 a rappel station was added to the descent so the entire route can be done with one 70M rope. From the summit make three rappels: 1) Rap from the summit to the base of the bolt ladder. Â 2) Rap from the base of the bolt ladder rap off the overhang (toward the road) and onto the slab, and trend left a little into the corner. You'll find the chains above a small stance. 3) Rap from the corner stance to the ground.
content.protection:
OW gear, offset nuts, aiders, bat hook, quickdraws, light free rack

20 Quick draws (for bolt ladder)

1 @ Cams # .75, 1, 2, 3, 4

1 @ Cams # 5 and/or 6 (if you plan to climb the off-width on pitch 2)
content.location:
Near the entrance to Pine Canyon and about 1/4 mile down canyon (toward the river) from

Private Pizza Wall

.

Located on the same wall as Private Pizza, halfway between Private Pizza and Pine Canyon.

Approach slightly up-canyon of the Tower, traverse up and right through the talus to the base of the tower.

content.description:
Climb into a pod and clip the first bolt. Navigate a shallow "trough" with really cool right-leaning ripples and holds. Gain the foot ramp, move up and left, then negotiate the insanely awesome holds on the polished black rock above.

This route could be used as an alternate start to the Haagenschlong.
content.protection: Five glue-in bolts to MASSIVE anchors with permanent carabiners
content.location: Located on the triangle shaped steep slab between the two starts to the actual Haagenschlong Tower route. On the right is a jumbled low-angle gully, on the left is a 5" crack.
